desc: 15 tests: 5 config validation (project-types.json exists, 7 types, required fields, generic empty detect, unique priorities), 6 classification (generic, web-app, api-service, cli-tool, library, monorepo), 2 backward compat (detected_stack+project_type, installed+type_confidence), 2 priority resolution (weight wins, monorepo priority) -- all failing

14 tests: 3 output creation (dir, 3 TOONs, stack-hash), 2 web-app conventions (TypeScript backend, design tokens UX), 2 cli-tool conventions (Bash backend, help text UX), 2 library conventions (per detection backend, API surface UX), 3 no raw placeholders (backend, frontend, uiux), 1 idempotency (second run identical), 1 generic fallback -- all failing

23 tests: 5 web-app pipeline (detect->classify, generate->backend, generate->uiux, compile->dept_conventions, compile->TypeScript), 4 shell-project pipeline (detect->cli-tool, generate->Bash, generate->CLI UX, compile->Bash), 3 compile dept injection (architect NO dept_conventions, senior YES, lead NO), 4 refresh mechanism (hash create, skip, force, change detection), 7 YOLO self-test (cli-tool detection, Bash backend, BATS testing, CLI UX focus, error output, no TypeScript, no React) -- all failing
